start.text: At the crest of the world, scars of old battles whisper in the fog.

wind.text: The wind carries a vow: protect those below from the drifting storm balloons.

valley.text: Small houses huddle like secrets. Cannons rest, hungry for thunder.

end_good.text: You held the pass. The mountain remembers your name.

end_neutral.text: The fog records no footprints today.

roundComplete.text: The balloons scatter. Your vigil marks the parchment of history.
